name: Wild West Shooter Pre-Alpha Build
description:
Pre Alpha ver 0.02

A Wild West themed, Multiplayer (LAN) FPS. 

-Scenario: It currently has one map with original 3D assets (except for the cactus and the gun) which will soon be on Unreal Maketplace.

-King of the Hill mode: Your team needs to capture the territory to win the game.

-Multiplayer: Play with your friends! Remember that the host needs to join the game as  spectator and open another game as a client if he wishes to play. Only LAN available for now.

This is our first project, please send us our feedback to  and remember that this is an Pre-Alpha build, some major features still yet to come :D

contact.crowdevs@gmail.com
